name: 8-Bit Shakespeare: Pucks Adventure
description:
Welcome to Pucks Adventure.

The controls are W,S,A,D to control Pucks position,

And Space to fire.

Your aim is to catch up with Cupids Arrow,

When you collide with an obstacle it will set you back,

But when you shoot and destroy them it will halt the arrows progress.

Make sure not to let the arrow get too far ahead and leave the screen!
